participant_1.background:
I'm not that close to my family, but I do try to keep in touch.
i like to bowl.
i want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
My favorite people are my family and the customers I clean for.
I enjoy eating at the local pub on sunny days after a round of golf with my friends.
i used to cheerlead in high school.
my dad works offshore.

content.text: Hey how's it going?
I'm good! Just got back from a round of golf with the buds.
That sounds fun! I used to play golf in high school.
Oh nice! Do you still play?
Not much, I live in an apartment now and don't have the space for a set of clubs.
That's too bad. Well, if you ever want to play a round, let me know.
Thanks, I will! What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh cool! I'm a journalist, but I actually work at Sears selling washers and dryers.
Wow, that's a big change! Why did you switch careers?
Well, I wanted to be a journalist, but I couldn't find a job in the field. So I took the first job I could get.
I see. Well, I'm sure you're still a great journalist, even if you're not working in the field.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
Oh, that's cool! I've never grown my own potatoes.
It's actually really easy! And it's a lot of fun to see how they grow.
I might have to try that sometime.
You should! It's really rewarding.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the tip.
No problem!
